amendment.description: To require a report by the Comptroller General of the United States on diversity and inclusion within the civilian workforce of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1907 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1907 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Warner to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4186) To require a report by the Comptroller General of the United States on diversity and inclusion within the civilian workforce of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1907 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1907 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Warner to Amendment SA 2301.
